effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user hurls a shadowy blob at the
target. It may also lower the target’s
Sp. Def stat.
